for blockhashes"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"calculateBlockheaders(bytes[],bytes32)":{"notice":"starts with a given blockhash and its header and tries to recreate a (reverse) chain of blocks the array of the blockheaders have to be in reverse order (e.g. [100,99,98,97]) if the provided chain is not correct (parentHash != calculated hash) if the hash is correct it will return the blockhash of the last header"},"constructor":"constructor, calls snapshot-function when contract get deployed as entry point","getParentAndBlockhash(bytes)":{"notice":"returns the blockhash and the parent blockhash from the provided blockheader"},"recreateBlockheaders(uint256,bytes[])":{"notice":"starts with a given blocknumber and its header and tries to recreate a (reverse) chain of blocks  only usable when the given blocknumber is already in the smart contract it will be checked whether the provided chain is correct by using the calculateBlockheaders function if successfull the last blockhash of the header will be added to the smart contract"},"saveBlockNumber(uint256)":{"notice":"stores a certain blockhash to the state will fail if the block can't be found inside the evm"},"searchForAvailableBlock(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"returns the closest snapshot if found within the given range returns 0 if no snapshot has been found in that rnage"},"snapshot()":{"notice":"stores the currentBlock-1 in the smart
